channel.title: What If It HAD Been An Icepick Instead Of A Crowbar?
channel.description:
i recently got my hand on the old Half-Life 2 Alpha, its really glitchy to say the least, but i noticed the old icepick instead on the crowbar.....
What im thinking is what would this have done to the Half-Life series if it had been an icepick??
Why an icepick, why not a hammer, or a knife like in OF?

intooblivion:

Oh yeah, forgot how fucking massive the Beta was…

item.title: What If It HAD Been An Icepick Instead Of A Crowbar?
item.dc:creator: The_Justifier
item.description:
I think they putted a Icepick instead of a Crowbar to make it blend with the surrounding terrain…Like…What is a Icepick used for?Climbing ice things and all that…and what weather is forecasted at the Borealis?Chilly.
Crowbar is for more urban places like city 17 where you would do nothing with a Icepick.

Read full topic

A bad game due to lack of common sense.
